reviewtext: I have two challenges which have made finding proper fitting ear buds problematic.  First, my ear canals are a bit on the small side.  (This issue does not transcend my ear canals but, I digress)  Second(ly), I'm missing that little flap of skin that other people have on their (misshapen) ears that holds ear buds in place.  Despite these challenges, these things stay in place, are quite comfortable, and sound good in the bargain.If you're interested, there is also a wealth of information on the Internets that explains how to modify these things to make them sound and fit even better.  For now, I'm plenty happy with what I got for my $12.
